sedris::seDRMColour

sedris::seDRMColour Class Reference

seDRMColour wraps the DRM <Colour> abstract class. More...

Inherited by sedris::seDRMColourIndex, and sedris::seDRMInlineColour.

virtual SE_DRM_Class getClassType () const

Detailed Description

seDRMColour wraps the DRM <Colour> abstract class.

Note:
This is an ABSTRACT DRM class.
Author:
Warren Macchi
Version:
Revision: 1.8
See also:
seDRMBase

Member Function Documentation

virtual SE_DRM_Class sedris::seDRMColour::getClassType (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Gets the DRM class type this object can reference (mostly internal use).

Warning:
Don't confuse with getDRMClass(), which is dependent on the actual type held by this DRM class object reference (especially because this is an abstract DRM class).
Returns:
SE_CLS_DRM_COLOUR

Reimplemented from sedris::seObject.

Reimplemented in sedris::seDRMColourIndex, and sedris::seDRMInlineColour.
